Race.SpecificTitle: Chief of Police -- Village of Pine Prairie
PW School District -- Local Option - Term Limits
Race.FullText:
"LOCAL OPTION ELECTION
Within Evangeline Parish School District:
Shall the number of terms of office that any member of the school board may serve be limited to three consecutive four-year terms?"

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Communications Dist. -- 1.02 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Communications District)
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 1.02 mills property tax renewal for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating an enhanced 911 emergency telephone system (including the payment of necessary personnel).
Race.FullText: Shall Evangeline Parish Communications District, Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a one and two hundredths (1.02) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $227,785.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2014 and ending with the year 2023, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating an enhanced 911 emergency telephone system (including the payment of necessary personnel)?

Race.SpecificTitle: Police Jury Ward No. 1 -- .84 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Police Jury Ward No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, .84 mills property tax renewal for the purpose of maintaining and 
upkeeping public cemeteries located in Police Jury Ward No. 1.
Race.FullText: Shall Police Jury Ward No. 1, Parish of Evangeline, Louisiana (the "Ward"), be authorized to renew the levy of an eighty-four hundredths (.84) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Ward (an estimated $44,921.67 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for the purpose of maintaining and upkeeping public cemeteries located in Police Jury Ward No. 1?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road & Drain. Sales Tax Dist.#1 -- 2% S&U - PJ - 15 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road and Drainage Sales Tax District No. 1 Proposition

Summary:  To renew a 2% sales and use tax currently being levied and collected by Road and Drainage Sales Tax District No. 1 (the "District") in those precincts of Ward 1, Ward 3, Ward 4 and Ward 5 of Evangeline Parish, Louisiana, and to establish a new sales and use tax in those precincts of Ward 2 recently added to in the boundaries of the District, for a period of not to exceed 15 years, to acquire equipment, to construct, improve, maintain and resurface public roads and bridges in the District, including incidental drainage and improving, maintaining and operating drainage facilities.
Race.FullText: Shall Road and Drainage Sales Tax District No. 1 of the Parish of Evangeline, State of Louisiana (the "District"), under the provisions of Article VI, Section 29 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to renew a two percent (2%) sales and use tax (the "Tax") currently being levied and collected in those precincts of Ward 1, Ward 3, Ward 4 and Ward 5 of Evangeline Parish, within the original boundaries of the District, and to establish a new 2% sales and use tax to be levied by the District in those precincts of Ward 2 of Evangeline Parish recently included in the boundaries of the District (an estimated $4,023,685 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) all for a period not to exceed fifteen (15) years commencing October 1, 2013 (or the date of the first levy of the Tax) upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the distribution and storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services within the District, all as presently defined in R.S. 47:301 through 47:317, for the purposes of acquiring equipment, constructing, improving, maintaining and resurfacing public roads and bridges in the District, including incidental drainage and improving, maintaining and operating drainage facilities, and further, shall the District be authorized to fund the proceeds of the Tax into bonds to be issued in series from time to time for such capital purposes, to the extent and in the manner permitted by the laws of Louisiana, including Sub-Part F, Part III, Chapter 4, Title 39 of the Louisiana Revised Statutes of 1950, as amended?

Race.SpecificTitle: Waterworks District No. 1 -- 12.81 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Waterworks District No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
 
Summary:  10 year, 12.81 mills tax renewal for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining, operating and extending the waterworks facilities of the District.
Race.FullText: Shall Waterworks District No. 1 of the Parish of Evangeline, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a twelve and eighty-one hundredths (12.81) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $496,440 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2014 and ending with the year 2023, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining, operating and extending the waterworks facilities of the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Prairie Mamou GDD No. 8 -- 3.5 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Prairie Mamou Gravity Drainage District No. 8  Proposition

Summary:  10 Year, 3.5 mills new property tax proposition to be dedicated and used for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating drainage works within and for the District.
Race.FullText: Shall Prairie Mamou Gravity Drainage District No. 8 of Evangeline Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a new special tax of 3.5 mills on all property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $6,364.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating drainage works within and for the District?
